ingredients.ingredient: 2 (3 ounce) packages instant vanilla pudding mix
1 (16 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed

cookingTips: Thaw whipped topping completely before folding to avoid lumps
Use cold milk for pudding to ensure it sets properly before mixing with whipped topping
Fold gently to maintain the fluffy texture
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Explain why thawing the whipped topping is important and how gentle folding preserves the light, airy texture of this dessert dip.
